name: Music Mafia
description:
A game I've made for VK Clickteam Fusion GAMEJAM#3 event: https://vk.com/click.team_fusion?w=wall-149017466_635

The GameJam theme was: TWO COLORS.

I've tried to experiment with genres and combine two uncombinable things: midcore resource-management RTS and rhythm game. I think the result is much better than it could have been (it took me about 4 days to create that thing). Hope you'll enjoy it! Leave a comment below with your feedback!

CONTROLS: Mouse-only
